attributes.title: Quantity Field
attributes.readMe:
A field for displaying quantities, inventory levels, or stock counts with visual progress indication.

**Features:**
- Gradient progress bar showing quantity relative to max
- Dynamic color coding based on stock levels
- Unit display support (e.g., "50 units")
- Configurable min/max range
- Decimal precision control

**Color Thresholds:**
- 0-25%: Red (Low stock)
- 25-50%: Orange (Medium-low)
- 50-75%: Yellow (Medium)
- 75-100%: Green (Well stocked)

**Embedded View:**
- Compact card with quantity, unit, and progress bar
- Color-coded visual feedback

**Atom View:**
- Minimal display with value and unit
- Small progress indicator
